name: Ghost Boy Ghoul Grabber
description:
This game takes place in a spooky mansion that is haunted by ghosts that our main character, Ghost Boy, must snap photos of to prove to his friends that ghosts are real.

Ghost Boy has to deal with tricky rooms and corridors that the ghosts patrol through in order to get within range of his camera to snap a photo while avoiding detection by the ghosts themselves. If he gets caught, he is possessed and you need to restart from the beginning!
